title: Enchanted ruby sickle (b)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The enchanted ruby sickle (b) is an item obtained by using a ruby on a silver sickle (b), then casting Lvl-3 Enchant on the resulting ruby sickle (b). It is to be used on blisterwood logs to create a blisterwood sickle, which is then used to create the blisterwood flail.

The enchanted ruby sickle (b) is an item obtained by using a ruby on a silver sickle (b), then casting Lvl-3 Enchant on the resulting ruby sickle (b). It is to be used on blisterwood logs to create a blisterwood sickle, which is then used to create the blisterwood flail.

The sickle has a right-click "bloom" option which can be used next to rotten logs, branches or bushes in Mort Myre swamp to obtain Mort myre fungi, stems and pears. These items can be used to fill the Druid pouch which allows the player to fight Ghasts.

It can also be used to harm Vampyres and Vampyre Juvinates, but this is not recommended due to its weak stats.

[[File:Enchanted ruby sickle (b) detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''enchanted ruby sickle (b)''' is an item obtained by using a [[ruby]] on a [[silver sickle (b)]], then casting [[Lvl-3 Enchant]] on the resulting [[ruby sickle (b)]]. It is to be used on [[blisterwood logs]] to create a [[blisterwood sickle]], which is then used to create the [[blisterwood flail]].

The sickle has a right-click "bloom" option which can be used next to rotten logs, branches or bushes in [[Mort Myre]] swamp to obtain [[Mort myre fungi]], [[Mort myre stem|stems]] and [[Mort myre pear|pears]]. These items can be used to fill the [[Druid pouch]] which allows the player to fight [[Ghast]]s.

It can also be used to harm [[Vampyre]]s and [[Vampyre Juvinate]]s, but this is not recommended due to its weak stats.
